meaningMnemonic: If you yourself are a <radical>sun</radical>, and you <radical>stand</radical> next to another <radical>sun</radical>, no area around you will be <kanji>dark</kanji>. The two suns are very bright and standing right next to each other, so all the area will be lit up and nothing will be dark.
readingMnemonic: Since the sun has blinded you, your vision is now very <kanji>dark</kanji>. You can’t see anything, but you are hungry so you reach around for some food and eat it. Yuck! It’s <reading>an</reading>chovies (あん). You don’t even like anchovies, how did they get in your house?
